title: Life steal is a bit too good on carries.
body: you shouldnt be allowed to stack life steal on champions that can get 100% crit + 2.0+ atk speed + dmg steroids. its too much. {{champion:119}}  with {{item:3812}} and {{item:3072}} is just ridiculous and he isnt the only one who can abuse LS stacking. any carry with steroids and crit abuses it. it gets to a point where if you cant burst them down they literally just sit there standing still AAing you and regening more HP than the dmg you deal. part of the reason assassins cant do their job effectively is because of LS stacking.

replies.body: Lifesteal has always been too good on carries; not just draven, not just because of death's dance either.

What most players do not understand is that lifesteal was MEANT for carries.
Lifesteal makes ADCs have sustain and not be soloed by tanks but still keeps them burstable by assasins.
What most marksmen mains don't agree with, is that it's abusable as hell with critical hits. Requiring burst to be the only way to take them down since they'll sustain through anything else.
Thats Far into the lategame,by that time any apc should be able to kill an adc almost instantly.

no, they cant. {{champion:119}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}}  {{item:3031}} {{item:3139}}{{item:3812}}  {{item:3026}} {{summoner:7}}  just in a 1v1 scenario. add a {{champion:16}}  or {{champion:117}}  or {{champion:40}}  or any support that can heal or peel and it is very hard to kill that adc if they know how to kite. you are vastly underestimating what a late game carry can do.  most ADCs that die late game are just brain dead drones that think they are sitting turrets. you have no idea how effective life steal gets when you can kite properly and get proper peel.  ANY kind of poke damage is negated and made pointless. ANY kind of fail attempt at a dive is just a suicide and may as well be inting. if you cant 1 shot the carry they just will not die, and very few champs can do that late game. 

the main reason ADCs get bursted at all early and mid game is because they are forced to share a duo lane, meaning they are usually 4 levels behind everyone else. but DESPITE that huge difference in levels they are still more than useful to the team because of range, therefore a lvl 18 hyper carry is actually stupid to deal with if they are any good at simple kiting and positioning. a GOOD ADC, not the simple minded drones that insta lock cait because "traps op" and start melee forming the enemy lux with the butt of her gun.

Honestly, just reducing the lifesteal heal for ranged champs would be all it takes to fix it.

Well, for some reason thinks it's a good idea to add anti burst mechanics to high sustain items, so they counter their own counter, all while giving the highest AD in the game so you hardly loose damage from takeing it.
Back in the days, Assasins did **counter** lifesteal, because they would burst the adc before he can sustain. Now those items atöeast delay(often even deny) the burst so they can use the lifesteal even vs burst.(themn surviveing the burst is not only because of the lifesteal-items anti burst mechanics, they just get soooo much protection shoved up their ass from everythere, it's rediculous)

Overall, Lifesteal is a kinda bullshit mechanic, as it increases survivabillity based on DPS, so if you deal more damage, you also get harder to kill. This causes it to be a very snowbally stat that also only feels good on champs that can reliably get really high dps.

I hope they try replaceing it with effects similar to current warlord, maybe even with less scaleing, so tanky champs with less damage can make use of it aswell while dps champs don't hyperscale with it.

But as it looks, Riot just takes a comblicated root and instead of getting rid of GW **and balanceing lifesteal in a scenario where it can't be easily reduced by 40%**, they add GW to thornmail. THen probably everyone will get thornmail to deal with the absurd lifesteal, which causes riot to nerf thornmail 'cause it crowds out other choices' and lifesteal once again is an issue, just that we have another hardcounter items vs the likes of Aatrox that are intendet to drainrank.

Yeah honestly let's just remove all life steal items. If you want sustain get a healing support like:
{{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:267}}  or something

Lifesteal needs to not be amplified by crits, it should calculate based off of just base damage done or just straight up not grant any life-steal should you crit, they should be things you invest in like you want more damage so you go crit path or you want more healing so you go the lifesteal path.

A middle ground to this would be that when you crit lifesteal gain is reduced by 70%, but acts normal on non crits.
